Package serverSide.sharedRegions

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverSide.sharedRegions.Table
  • public class Table
extends Object
    Table It is responsible for the the synchronization of the Students and Waiter is implemented as an implicit monitor. There is one internal synchronization points: a single blocking point for the Student, where he waits for the Waiter to signal

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addUpOnesChoice()
      Operation add up ones choice Called by the first student to arrive to add up the companion's choice to the order waits until gets the choices from companions
      void deliverPortion()
      Operation deliver portion Called by the waiter to deliver portion signals students that portion was delivered waits for all students to eat the course
      void describeTheOrder()
      Operation describe the order Called by the first student to arrive to describe the order signals waiter that the order was described
      void endEating()
      Operation end eating Called by the student to end eating
      void endOperation()
      Operation end of work.
      void getThePad()
      Operation get the pad Called by the waiter to get the pad signal student that he got the pad and waits until student describes the order
      boolean hasEverybodyChosen()
      Operation has everybody chosen Called by the first student to arrive to check if every companion has chosen
      boolean hasEverybodyFinished()
      Operation has everybody finished Called by the student to check if everybody has finished signals waiter that everybody finished eating waits for next course to be ready
      boolean haveAllClientsBeenServed()
      Operation have all clients been served Called by the waiter to check if all clients have been served
      void honourTheBill()
      Operation honour the bill Called by the last student to arrive to honour the bill signals the rest of the students that he/she has paid the bill
      void informCompanion()
      Operation inform Companion Called by the student (that was not the first to arrive) to inform companion Signal first student that it has been informed and waits for the course to be ready
      void joinTheTalk()
      Operation join the talk Called by the first student to arrive to join the talk waits until course is ready
      void prepareTheOrder()
      Operation prepare the order Called by the first student to arrive to prepare the order waits until gets the choices from companions
      void presentTheBill()
      Operation present the bill Called by the waiter to present the bill signals last student that bill is ready waits for student to pay
      void readMenu()
      Operation read menu Called by the student to read the menu, wakes up waiter to signal that he has read the menu

      Operation salute the client Called by the waiter to salute the client
